short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Wallacy Wallet is a hybrid and gamified crypto wallet. We are pleased to introduce Wallacy Extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Wallacy Wallet is a hybrid and gamified crypto wallet. We are pleased to introduce Wallacy Extension, allowing you to efficiently manage and swiftly convert Multichain assets while securely exploring the Web 3 world.

Wallacy Extension Key Features:
- Easy Asset Management Effortlessly: manage, view, and track assets like Tokens, NFTs, and Wallacy Gems.
- Instant Cross-Chain Swaps/Bridge: Swiftly transfer assets across Ethereum ecosystems, including Ethereum, BNB Chain, Arbitrum, Base, Optimism, and Polygon.
- Seamless dApp Connectivity: Securely connect to dApps and approve transactions with transparent permissions.

In addition to Wallacy Extension, you can also utilize the Wallacy Mobile App (available on Android and iOS) to access a full range of gamified features. All versions are instantly synced for your convenience.
Link to download All version of Wallacy Wallet: https://wallacy.io/download/

Wallacy Wallet thrives on community engagement, and our team is enthusiastic about receiving your input and offering support to our users. Feel free to stay connected with us

Visit our Website: https://wallacy.io/
Join our Telegram Community: https://t.me/wallacywalletglobal
Follow our news update on Twitter: https://twitter.com/WallacyWallet
